summary: Near the end of WW2, prisoners of war are used in experiments to perfect the "Aryan" race.
cast: Mircha Carven|Paola Corazzi|Giorgio Cerioni|Giovanna Mainardi|Serafino Profumo|Attilio Dottesio|Patrizia Melega|Almina De Sanzio|Matilde Dall'Aglio|Agnes Kalpagos|Inga Alexandrova|Maurizio Reti
title: Lager SSadis Kastrat Kommandantur
